name: Texas A&M Cheer Squad
description:
The Texas A&M Cheer Squad is an all-girl intermediate competitive cheerleading team that attends several competitions throught the fall and spring semesters. We practice Sunday, Monday, and Wednesday nights and have several fundraising and team bonding events throughout the year.

The organization will not cheer at any athletic department events nor respresent itself as an official spirit organization of the university. The purpose of the organization is to provide the participants with the opportunity to compete in the Collegiate Division of state and national competitive cheerleading competitions.

Learn more about our team on our website: https://tamucheersquad.wixsite.com/tamucheer

Contact us at: tamucheersquad@gmail.com
